response.summary:
Mechanical Engineer with extensive experience in the Oil & Gas industry, specialized in sealing systems for pumping equipment. Broad knowledge of API plans and familiarity with API 610 and API 682 standards. Expert in failure analysis and problem-solving. Proficiency in using CAD software for designing components and assemblies.

Passionate about knowledge-sharing, I've had the privilege of providing training to clients in sealing systems, demonstrating effective communication skills. My dedication to excellence is reflected in my ability to facilitate efficient and satisfactory solutions.
response.skills: Español, Solid Edge, Inglés, Ingeniería, Investigación, Comunicación, Liderazgo

profile_positions.description:
Provide valuable support for challenging applications and intricate issues by conducting failure analyses, troubleshooting in the field, and engaging in customer meetings.

Evaluate customer requisites, encompassing specifications, data research, and the identification of cost-effective construction materials and optimal lead times for fluid control systems.

Engage in effective oral and written communication with customers, sales teams, and colleagues to provide expert counseling, recommendations, and technical guidance.

Offer guidance to sales representatives and clients, ensuring the successful completion of seal support system applications.

Analyze designs and component part specifications, consistently suggesting enhancements and changes to optimize project outcomes.
profile_positions.title: Applications Engineer

education.degree_name: Estudios de maestria en ingenieria mecanica

company.name: John Crane
company.description:
For more than 100 years, John Crane has been your source for optimizing the reliable and continuous performance of mission-critical rotating equipment across all process industries. Being a valued and trusted partner for our customers is more than what we do―it is our legacy. Your name is how we make ours. 

The company designs and manufactures a variety of products, including mechanical seals and systems, couplings, filtration systems, and digital diagnostic technologies. John Crane customer service is accessed through a global network of more than 200 sales and service facilities in over 50 countries. 

John Crane is part of Smiths Group, a global leader in applying advanced technologies for markets in threat and contraband detection, energy, communications, and engineered components.
